Why Kottravai

Because every purchase is a vote for dignity.Kottravai uplifts, connects, and inspires women to shape their destinies.

💜

A Platform with a Pulse

Every purchase supports a real woman, her family, and her future.

🌱

Sustainable by Default

We turn what others discard into opportunity and pride.

🎓

Trained, Not Trapped

Women here are skilled, empowered, and building their own destinies.

🔗

Every Shell Has a Story

Scan, connect, and meet the maker behind every product.

Our Movement

This is not just a product. It’s a second chance. For decades, she rolled beedis in silence — inhaling smoke, hiding talent, losing health. Today, through Kottravai, those same hands shape bowls, baskets, toys, and tools — each one a declaration:

I am more than survival. I am skill, I am strength, I am the future.

OUR CRAFT HUBS

The Space of Her Strength, The Center of Our Unity.

Coconut Crafting Hub

Where discarded shells become treasured keepsakes. Every curve holds stories of patience, earth, and ancestral skill.

Discover More

Banana Bark Hub

From nature’s leftover to living room art. Our women craft pieces with threads of tradition and roots of resilience.

Discover More

Weaving Hub

Coir becomes craft in these hands. Each knot is a line of a story told without words.

Discover More

Electronics Hub

Not just wires and circuits — but dignity in design. We train women in rural electronics to create tools with purpose.

Discover More

Stories of Transformation

Hear from the women who are building the future and the community that supports them

"I thought my hands were only meant for housework. Now, I send my products to people I’ve never met — and they love them. It changed my world."

Meena

Creator, Kottravai

Tenkasi

"When I use my Kottravai bowl, I remember the woman behind it. It’s more than a product — it’s a relationship."

Priya

Customer

HCL, Madurai

"It’s not charity. It’s legacy-building. These women are not beneficiaries — they are entrepreneurs."

Santhosh

Mentor

TASS, Shankarankoil

The First Sale.

That first order? It wasn’t just a sale. It was proof. That belief + effort + courage = transformation. From one humble bowl to hundreds of creations. From one woman to a thousand more waiting.
